name: defend-order
caption: Defend Order

effect.short: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
effect.full: Raises the user's [Defense]{mechanic:defense} and [Special Defense]{mechanic:special-defense} by one [stage]{mechanic:stage}.

flavorText:
The user calls out its underlings to shield its body,
raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
